resources.string: With this programm you can speed up your device and improve powersaving!\n

1) Make system and data backups using custom recovery (if you can make it)\n 2) Make build.prop file and init.d folder backups using utility, which presents in this programm\n 3)You must understand that tweaks should be installed with the mind, because many installed tweaks can cause conflicts!
Understand, that you solely responsible for any damage device!
ROOT, BUSYBOX, INIT.D SUPPORT IS REQUIRED!\n

If button "CALIBRATE" not active, verify the implementation of both the calibration terms (100% battery level and connected power).

Calibrate process includes deleting files from /data/system/:
- batterystats.bin
- batterystats-daily.xml
- batterystats-checkin.bin
ATTENTION! CALIBRATION MAY DAMAGE THE BATTERY OR THE DEVICE! DO ONLY AT YOUR OWN RISK

You can make battery calibration only if you have problems with low energy efficiency devices without objective reasons (e.g., battery swelling), incorrectly shows the battery level. Also you can make calibrate when you reinstalled ROM on your device. 
Please do not make battery calibration just like that, because you can damage your device or battery

But if you do decide to do the calibration (of course, at your own risk), follow the instructions below:
1) Fully charge your device
2) Without stopping to charge the device, perform the calibration by pressing the appropriate button below.

It is recommended to reboot now. 

Do you want to reboot your device?

It is recommended to reboot now.


Do you want to reboot your device? 


It is also recommended after the reboot to go to the this speed-up utility and click on the optimize button. The system is fully optimized and will work well and smoothly!
Please note, that the dates are updated only after the page is refreshing. That is, if you did backup - refresh the page and the date is set to the correct!
You can found backup files in: /sdcard/SystemTweaker/backups
This section contains tweaks that can help you increase the battery life of the device.\n
Increase WiFi autoscan time\nThis tweak improves powersaving
Enable Power Collapse\nThis option allows system to go into a deep sleep when the screen is off
Enable better management of sensors during deepsleep
This section contains tweaks that can help you increase the speed and stability of internet.\n
Internet Tweaks\nImproving WiFi/3G/2G/4G tweaks, increasing download speed, improving stability
Improving internet speed\nChanging the TCP values for the better
Fast Dormancy\nEnabling this feature can increase the speed of the internet, but also reduce powersaving
These tweaks may not work on all devices!\n
This section includes the different other tweaks\n
Remove adb debug icon from statusbar

On this page you can send an email to the developer. I can help you if you have problems or questions \n\nTo contact me, please write your message in the field "Text of message" and then click "Send". Your device prompts you to select the mail application to send a message, select the application, send me an email. If you have not e-mail app on your device, you can contact me with this e-mail: NowenUI@bk.ru
The message can not be sent, no installed e-mail clients.
\nThank you very much for purchasing the professional version of this program!\n
This program allows you to customize your device, will help to get the maximum performance and help to increase the battery life of your device\n

Used libraries: 
- RootTools by Stericson
- RootShell by Stericson
- android-gif-drawable
- EasyDeviceInfo by nisrulz
- AndroidDeviceNames by jaredrummler 
- DeviceInformation by akexorcist

Before using the program, you should read agreement

 1) Program developer is not responsible for unpredictable results using the program

 2) Yes, you should understand that developer not responsible for the broken devices, dead batteries, etc

 3) All the features of the program is for information only, their presence does not mean their using

 4) You can not use the program for their own purposes, or any part of the code of the program without the consent of the developer, but bear in mind paragraph 5

 5) All of the features, presented in the program (tweaks, battery calibration technology, speed-up technology with one click and etc.), are available to the public, you can use them for their own purposes (for example, commercial purposes)
This section contains tweaks that can be used to increase the stability and speed of the system and customize it\n
Force home launcher into memory (use light launchers only)\nUse only if your phone have many free RAM
Render UI with GPU, improving smooth of scrolling\nEnabling this tweak may improve performance and smooth, but only if your GPU is powerful
Improving smooth and speed of scrolling
Auto-zipalign every boot and every week\nThis tweak improving speed and performance of your phone
Auto optimize SQLite every boot and every week\nThis tweak improving speed and performance of your phone
FSTRIM- special utility that accelerates the operation of the device by performing the TRIM operation on the memory device\n
Firstly, install a library to work with FSTRIM, then make FSTRIM, select the partition(s) and press "FSTRIM"\n\n
Button status is updated only after reloading the page
Required libraries are already installed. \nNo installation required, just use

MediaServer - it is a system service that scans the external memory (if available), and the internal memory of the presence of media. Please make service shutdown only when you have problems with performance or powersave.
Disable MediaServer on boot (init.d support is required)
Disable MediaScanner on boot (init.d support is required)
This section contains tweaks that can be used to improve photo and video quality\n
Improving the quality of the photo shoot and video up to 100%
Increase the quality of receive and transmit speech in mobile networks by including AMR WIDEBAND functions
Please click BACK again to exit
On this page you can shutdown or reboot your device in the selected by you mode\n
Are you sure want to turn off your device?)
Are you sure want to make hot reboot?)
Are you sure want to reboot info recovery?)
Are you sure want to reboot info bootloader?)

This app need working root, busybox and init.d! You can activate init.d support with Init.d toogler program

You can install busybox using Busybox app

All this apps present in Google Play!
On this page you can change your device\'s DPI. \n\nDPI - Dots Per Inch. It is used to determine the screen resolution. By changing the DPI you can increase or decrease the items on the screen
Optimize EXT4 file system every boot (use only if your device have EXT4 file system)
Root, busybox and init.d support are needed!
Are you sure want to fully reboot your device?)
Improve display image quality\nImplemented by the system calibration
